content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hi Everyone,\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is an EE training material required to be reviewed by all EE employees, contractors and subcontractors of EE and its affiliates. Although contractors and subcontractors are not employees of EE, they are required to comply with the standards in this document while performing services for EE.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This document shouldn't be shared with any other third party without the written consent of EE.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By entering this training, you acknowledge that you are either an employee of EE or a contractor or subcontractor performing services for EE, and that you will not share or misuse the training material you have accessed or downloaded outside of EPAM. You further acknowledge that by entering this training you expect no privacy from monitoring your progress and reporting your training completion success.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
